Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Leclaire
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Laramie, Augusta, Cicero and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Leclaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Laramie, Augusta, Cicero and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Leclaire.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/King Drive
ShortDescription: Eastbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, King Drive, 51st, Cottage Grove and 47th due to street blockage on 47th/King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, King Drive, 51st, Cottage Grove and 47th due to street blockage on 47th/King Drive.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
